# platform

## Purpose

Reusable foundation: crates, adapters, contracts.

## Rules

- Keep repo structure coherent and low-entropy.
- Prefer platform commands over manual restructuring.
- Platform never imports from products.

## Boundaries

- Allowed children:
  - crates
  - adapters
  - contracts
